body:
Tested successfully on linux-centos7-x86_64 / gcc@4.8.5

I added what I hope is a slightly more helpful note, referring folks to the build log (where the fully instantiated post-install instructions wind up) rather than just the package definition.

URL for security implications updated per admonition banner at https://singularity.lbl.gov/docs-security
title: singularity: update version to 3.3.0
